ygData.subject: Request for spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: Where do folks get these demon claws? They sound pretty dang cool ;) ... From:	Keith G. Spencer [SMTP:kgs@n-space.com] Sent:	Friday, June 18, 1999 3:25 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Where do folks get these demon claws? They sound pretty dang cool ;)

-----Original Message-----
From: Keith G. Spencer [SMTP:kgs@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 3:25 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons

<< File: ATT00006.htm >> From: David Lendrum <Karnek@...>


Decisions aplenty...I am a level 27 bard and I can't figure out which
weapons to use. I have a barbed leather whip, dragoon dirk, demon claws,
polished granite tomahawk, and screaming mace.

By the numbers:

BLW: 7/28 - .25
PGT: 6/26 - .23 (Agilitly loss due to proc really hurts this as well)
DC: 5/19 - .26
DD: 6/23 - .26
SM: 8/35 - .22

I'd end up wielding the Demon Claws with the Dragoon Dirk... Now I just
wish you were on Tarew Marr so I could buy your whip.

-TopFlite
Fendryl Istalindir, HalfElven Minstrel of Tarrew Marr
